name: HOPE (itch) (The Flavare)
description:
A free downloadable pixel art game for windows

Prologue

The last human being alive in the post-apocalypse era. Someone who has lived alone for months, without anyone to communicate with and talk to. One day he was doing his daily routine, looking for supplies or necessities of life in the area where he lived. But, in the middle of his activities, he found something that he unable to believe.

Gameplay

A 10-minute game story-based experience about the sole survivor of armageddon and desperately in finding others survivor.  Easy to play by control walking left/right, solve the little puzzle by finding the right items.

Feature

- Story-based game
- 10 min + Aprox of gameplay.
- Controller compatible
- Pixel arts
- Mobile version (soon)
